contracts.title: Delivery of the  Healthy Weight Programme
contracts.description:
Lancashire's Cardiovascular Disease (CVD) mortality rates are well above the England average which in part is likely to be associated with correspondingly high levels of deprivation. Two of the common modifiable risk factors of CVD is being overweight or

contracts.title: Consultancy Work for a Biodiversity Net Gain Assessment Study
contracts.description:
The scope of this project is to undertake an assessment of 19 sites to calculate their current biodiversity value (using the latest Biodiversity Metric) and to estimate the uplift in biodiversity value they can deliver and estimate the costs for delivering, maintaining and monitoring this uplift for a period of at least 30 years. This work is intended to inform the Council's decision whether to make sites available on the market to deliver BNG off-site through development management.

contracts.title: Installation Of New Christmas Lighting Catenary At Haslingden and Rawtenstall
contracts.description:
•	Contractors are invited to submit prices  for the renewal of the  cross the street Christmas lighting catenary at both Haslingden and Rawtenstall town centres . The lighting at Haslingden is sited on Deardengate and Manchester Road with approximately 400 meters of catenary and festoon cabling with 800 LED lamps . The lighting at Rawtenstall is sited on Bank Street and Ormerod Street  with approximately 300 meters of catenary and festoon lighting with 600 LED lamps. 
Follow link for documents

contracts.description:
Rossendale Borough Council is seeking a partner to take over the day to day running of Rawtenstall Market over a minimum of a 25 year lease.

The partner will fund the refurbishment of the site and generate further proposals that will boost footfall and drive the destination as a tourist attraction for the local community and visitors. The tenderer will be responsible for promotion, events, stall management, maintenance and associated running costs.

Tenderers are required to submit a busine

contracts.title: Invitation to Tender for public CCTV installation and maintenance in Rossendale
contracts.description:
Rossendale Borough Council is currently seeking tender submissions for CCTV installation and maintenance and a 'people counting' CCTV system.

The deadline for submissions is 12noon 29th October 2018.

The tenders available are two separate tenders and they both can be found at the link below on Rossendale Council website.

https://www.rossendale.gov.uk/info/210170/business/10745/working_with_the_council/3

contracts.title: RBC Affordable Warmth Project
contracts.description:
Rossendale Borough Council would like to invite you to provide a quotation for the provision of an Affordable Warmth Project. We are specifically interested organisations who are able to work with vulnerable people achieve thermal comfort in their homes. 
 
The funding aims to reduce levels of death and illness over the winter months and to improve people's wellbeing; as a consequence we also hope to see a reduction in hospital admissions and in demand for health and social care services

contracts.title: Rossendale Borough Council Valuation Services
contracts.description:
Rossendale Borough Council is seeking to establish a framework of suitably qualified and experienced real estate professionals
to provide us with on-hand expertise across the full spectrum of real estate related issues. 

The services required under this framework are:

•	Market Advice and Commentary
•	Market Value and Market Rental Value
•	General Strategic and Valuation Advice
•	Comparable Valuations
•	Investment Valuations
•	Reinstatement Valuations
&b
contracts.cpv_description: Real estate agency services on a fee or contract basis

contracts.title: ITT - Project Manager - Whitaker Museum, HLF Round One Application
contracts.description:
Invitation to Tender for Project Manager - Whitaker Museum, Heritage Lottery Fund, Round One Application.

Rossendale Borough Council (RBC) is seeking tenders from competent contractors and established project managers to oversee the smooth and effective delivery of the development round 1 of the Whitaker Experience (HLF barn and stables project). 

For Information and Instructions on how to submit a Tender please visit http://www.rossendale.gov.uk/site/scripts/download_info.php?downloadID=7

contracts.title: Rossendale Borough Council Rawtenstall Town Centre Masterplan Invitation to Tender for Retail Agent
contracts.description:
Rossendale is a local government district with borough status. It is made up of a number of small former mill towns in Lancashire, England centred around the valley of the River Irwell in the industrial North West. With a population of around 67,000 the district combines urban with rural aspects, and is close to the more populated areas of Bolton, Burnley, Bury, Manchester and Rochdale.
The Spinning Point project involves the partial redevelopment of the former Valley Centre site in the town ce

contracts.title: Rossendale Borough Council Replacement Storage Area Network Storage as a Service
contracts.description:
Rossendale currently utilises two IBM N-Series (Net App) Storage Area Network (SAN) systems to provide storage to our virtualised VMware infrastructure. The SANs connect to our vSphere hosts via iSCSI over our Cisco network switches. The SANs are hosted at the Node4 Tier 3 Data Centre.
The SAN is used to connect to the DraaS service that provide the disaster Recovery service for the organisation. All back is performed disk to disk there are no tape storage devices.
